QuestData.Title: Syth's Secret
QuestData.Description: Our deceased friend here was hiding more than a love of old scrolls and erotic sorcery-fiction. He had something truly valuable.$B$BIf I'm reading his notes correctly, he claims to have found the Eye of Anzu - Terokk's scrying orb from the days after his fall.$B$BWe need that orb! The notes say he stashed it in a ravager den just up the road.
QuestData.CompletionText: To hold such a treasure. I wonder if that Sun-Talon had any idea of the significance?
QuestData.RewardText: <Reshad gazes into the inky orb.>$B$BAmazing. To think Terokk used this very orb to commune with Anzu. One could become quite the darkweaver with an implement such as this.$B$BCome, let's get it safely to the Veil.
